channel.title: How do you change Defense Levels for Items?
channel.description:
Rofl n00b question... But this has been pissing me off. I have been adding the Item Id and Name to [code]GetCLDefense[/code] but It still doesn't change the level requirement.
What I want is for Black d'hide Chaps and Vambs to be defense level 1...
If anyone knows how to fix this, please post, and thank you!
